title: The Forgotten Jungler
body: There are those who prefer to jungle with champions such as Master Yi, Rengar, Wukong, & many other popular junglers, . but one jungler has been forgotten & tossed away like a useless toy. That forgotten jungler is the Void Burrower herself, Rek'Sai. Rek'Sai is one of the strongest junglers in the League rn. I'd like to see Riot give her attention. She needs it. Rek'Sai mustn't be forgotten. Not now or ever

replies.body: Not sure who you're playing with but ya, Rek'Sai is fine right now.
I was just fighting against one. Rek'sai makes a pretty good jungler, since she can move fast.
She's one of the most contested junglers right now at high elo and pro play.
